Day by day breakdown for the course at verint:

Day 1:
     Java script reminder
     functions in javascript
     closures
     functional programming in javascript

Day 2:
    OO javascript
    Javascript performance
    Javascript debugging
    Javascript security
   Javascript and the browser

Day 3:
    Extjs basics
=============
    classes in extjs
    querying and manipulating the DOM using extjs
    various utilities (xhr included)
    the module system

Day4:
   ExtJs core usage
=================
    Widgets and Layout management in extjs.
    Model view architecture

Day 5:
   Advanced ExtJs
==============
   Writing new widgets
   Writing new models
   Application architecture for extjs
